metadata.bio:
There are at least two artists named Biosphere:

1. Biosphere is the main recording name of Geir Jenssen (born 1962 in  Troms√∏, Norway), a musician who has released a notable catalog of ambient electronic music. He is well known for his "ambient house" and "arctic ambient" styles, his use of music loops, and peculiar samples from sci-fi sources. His track "Novelty Waves" was used for the 1995 campaign of Levi's. His 1997 album Substrata is generally seen as one of the all-time classic ambient albums. Before launching Biosphere, Jenssen was a member of the Norwegian synth pop band Bel Canto.

2. A lo-fi hip hop/beats producer from Toronto.
